The mainpage is where youâ€™ll find your campaigns. Campaigns are designed to help you organize your digital workflow and keep track of how things are going. Feel free to add as many different campaigns as you like - they can be organized by release, band, month, whatever works for you.

A campaign can be easily published as one single page on our hosted site or each individual element may be embedded on any site with a simple cut/paste just like you would a YouTube video.
